metadata.title: CVE-2023-31437 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** An issue was discovered in systemd 253. An attacker canmodify a sealed log file such that, in some views, not all existing andsealed log messages are displayed. NOTE: the vendor reportedly sent "areply denying that any of the finding was a security vulnerability."

criterions.comment: systemd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
